title: (x) Dr. John's - hand drawn {Karl}
content: Can anyone help me with this one? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140601im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22057.jpg)
author: julia

comments.content:
Hand drawn would be my guess.   
The o's are different.

I agree with Karl's guess, but if you are looking for something similar Juke Box fonts "Boxer Script" might work. The fonts are sold at Veer.com ![Boxer Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140601im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22061.gif)

Thanks Mike. Here's a direct link to [Boxer Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140601/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?image=JBT0000010), but you might want to look at [Fenway Park](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140601/http:/www.veer.com/results.asp?image=JBT0000019) as well. It doesn't have as harsh of a baseline join as Boxer Script does.
You're right Grant. I looked at both, but got too preoccupied with letterforms to notice the joins in my small samples in the Script Guide.
